attributes.action: wake up and smell the coffee, and ensure the Home Secretary exercises the pardon for Michael Shields - he is INNOCENT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael shields was incarcerated unjustifiably so 3 and a half years ago. This was for a crime he did not commit. The real murderer has since confessed, yet the Bulgarian authorities have not acted upon it. Now Jack Straw MP, Home Secretary must exercise the right he has to enforce a pardon upon this case for the release of Michael Shields. He is INNOCENT.
